content:
That's the spirit! Creating a playlist is a great way to get excited for the festival and discover new music. It's amazing how often we stumble upon hidden gems when exploring an artist's discography or related music.

I'm curious, what new songs or artists did you discover while making your playlist? Were there any surprises or pleasant discoveries that stood out to you?

Also, have you considered sharing your playlist on your blog or social media channels? It could be a great way to engage with your audience, share your musical tastes, and even inspire others to explore new music.

Remember, as you write your festival review, you could also mention how your experience with the playlist influenced your expectations or enhanced your overall festival experience. It's all about sharing your passion for music and connecting with like-minded individuals!
